title: scott2k
author: scott2k
content: Looking for 3 of these units.Will pay for shipping.Trusted escrow agent from this list REQUIRED. NO EXCEPTIONS.Serious buyer, very much wanting to make a good deal for some L7sReply here or DM if interested.Thanks

comments.author: Jhowie69
